column3: You are at the entrance of a maze
You are close to the entrance - it has begun to rain so you turn back to the entrance
You arrive at a split - you sit down - have acup of tea and then contine by going left
You stand close to the entrance and hide under a tree as the rain gets heavier then move forward
You arrive somewhere familiar - the path splits and you turn right
You have arrived at a dead-end - so turn around and take a tiny turning to the right
At the end of time - The quick brown fox jumps over the bush
